docs.text: Automatic upgrade theme won't work if you have edited theme files. To manually upgrade the theme, please follow the steps below: Upgrade the original theme but DO NOT activate it. Click Customize the original theme to go to Theme Editor. Reconfigure the theme style and settings. Make a new copy of the original theme. Edit theme files of the new copied theme to re-add your custom work. Test the new copied theme in the preview panel. Activate the new copied theme if no error.
